title: Serial Killer Isekai Ni Oritatsu Isekai: Battle Royale
alternative_title: シリアルキラー異世界に降り立つ 異世界バトルロイヤル ; Battle Royale in the Another World ; The Serial Killer Reincarnated into the Another World: Battle Royale
status: シリアルキラー異世界に降り立つ 異世界バトルロイヤル ; Battle Royale in the Another World ; The Serial Killer Reincarnated into the Another World: Battle Royale
description:
Description :
        A goddess, troubled by the fact that there are too many reincarnated people, declares that she will start a massacre among them.
The official spin-off of "The Serial Killer Reincarnated into the Another World" begins!
---
Note: The main story was written by Ichigo Hitotsubu, but with the start of the new series, it was revealed that he is also working under a different name, as Kawamoto Homura.
